411.eventContent:
Join us for an incredible evening of original dance pieces performed by our talented Dance Company!  On Saturday, February 3, 2024, the Conservatory of Dance Company will show off dances in a variety of styles.  From jazz, tap and ballet to hip-hop, contemporary and theatre dance, there is something for everyone.  Don’t miss this unique event!

Located at:
The Madison Center for the Arts
5601 N 16th Street
Phoenix, AZ 85016

484.eventContent:
Embark on an unforgettable summer of dance and creativity at Conservatory of Dance's Summer Camps! Dive into a world of artistic exploration with a lineup of exciting events:

Musical Theatre Workshops
9-4pm Everyday / Ages 7 & UP / Friday Performance
Price: $350
Week 1: June 3-7
Week 2: June 10-14

Dance Camps
9-4pm Everyday / Ages 7 & UP / Friday Performance
Ballet, Tap, Jazz, Hip-Hop, Contemporary, Lyrical, Theatre & Tumbling
Price: $350
Week 1: June 24-28
Week 2: July 8-12

Princess Camps
9-1pm Everyday / Monday-Thursday / Ages 7 & UP / Friday Performance
Visiting Princess Thursday Ballet, Tap, Jazz, Tumbling, Arts & Crafts, Etc
Price: $250
Week 1: June 17-20
Week 2: July 15-18

MDP Summer Intensive
Monday-Friday / 5 days / 4 levels / Lunch provided
Visiting Princess Thursday Ballet, Tap, Jazz, Tumbling, Arts & Crafts, Etc
Price: $350-$600
July 29-Aug 2

1580.eventContent:
Join us for an evening (7-10pm)of fun and games at our 3rd Annual Casino Night to benefit the CofD Company Dancers at the Conservatory of Dance Studio. Please invite your friends and family for a fun and exciting evening to help support the Company Booster Club. 

Tickets are $75 dollars each and include drinks (adult beverages included), food, and a $2,000 chip voucher upon entry. Craps, roulette, poker and blackjack can be enjoyed (and learned!) in a fun, no-pressure environment. No game experience is necessary. The evening’s top winners will receive a surprise gift sponsored by one of our fabulous company teams. The more chips you hold at the end of the night will increase your chances of winning. Must be present at the end of the evening to win.

Boosters are a foundational part of a performing arts organization like Conservatory of Dance. Thank you to everyone’s continued support.
